summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Seattle Public Utilities; authorizing the transfer to King County of certain real property rights and sewer facilities under the jurisdiction of Seattle Public Utilities by quit claim and bill of sale, in partial satisfaction of City of Seattle obligations under the "Agreement for Sewage Disposal" dated January 26, 1961, between the City of Seattle and the Municipality of Metropolitan Seattle, as amended, and authorizing execution of deeds and other documents necessary to accomplish said transfer.
